objectDesc.p: Palm-leaf manuscript. 89 leaves in Kuṭilā script. Apparently written in 1152 A.C.

history.p: In June 1934, Sāṅkṛtyāyana found this manuscript in the monastery of Kun-de-ling (Lhasa).

projectDesc.p: This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

div.p: [fol1v] || namo buddhāya || pamutus saṅ matuha, kayatnakna de saṅ sevaka dharma, saṅ mahyun maluya viśeṣa, rǝṅǝn kvājaraniṅ dharma, *amajaṅakna pǝtaṅ, tasakeṅ aji, aṅhiṅ byakta tuhutuhu jugeka, āpan iṅ aji ṅaranya, hanenucap, hana tinuduh, hana ginögvan, hana inaku, maṅkana svabhāvaniṅ aji, ṅa,

kunǝṅ saṅ putus tan maṅkaneka, bhaṭāra siddhaviśeṣa juga sinamaya, tan suvalǝn ta mariṅ śrī bhakti bhojana, śrī, ṅa, mās pirak ratna, bhakti, ṅa, sambah sarvapraṇamya, bhojana, ṅa, pānabhoga samāhalǝp, hayva ta maṅkana,
yan tumarimaṅ śrī, yāṅkǝn dinol vinǝli saṅ hyaṅ dharma, yan tumarimaṅ bhakti, yāṅkǝn abhedakǝn viśe[fol2r]ṣa ikā, yan tumarimaṅ bhojana, yāṅkǝn kneṅ bvat anaḍah *kavtvaniṅ samaya, hayva ta maṅkana,

lǝñok yan tan adṛvya kaharǝp, yan tumarimaṅ śrī, lǝñok yan tan kaviśeṣa ri lupa, yan tumarimaṅ bhakti, lǝñok yan tan kavaśa deniṅ tamah, āpaniṅ amaṅan enak varǝg, enak turūnya, viparīta kaliṅanya, āpan don saṅ viku, *miṅsǝpaniṅ saṅśaya, vikalpa, tṛṣṇā, lupa, saṅśaya, ṅa, āmbǝk sandeha, vikalpa, ṅa, āmbǝk mohut iṅ sarvavastu, tṛṣṇā, ṅa, āmbǝk matakut, mvaṅ sih, lupa, ṅa, āmbǝk hilaṅ, hayva ta maṅkana,

ya ta hetu saṅ putus umatīteṅ katon, karǝṅə̄, kahucap, kahiḍǝp, mari manambah riṅ guru, [fol2v] hilaṅniṅ saṅśaya, ka, mari mavarah riṅ śiṣya, mari sinambah, hilaṅniṅ vikalpa, ka, saṅkṣepanya, udasanāpulu ḍavak, tan atakuta pati, hana pva paranya, hilaṅniṅ tṛṣṇā, ka, tasmāt pvekaṅ taṅhi tan byāpāra, hilaṅniṅ lupa, ka, mari guru mari śiṣya, ikaṅ putus, ṅa,

kunaṅ hetuniṅ mari guru mari śiṣya, deniṅ varah tan saṅkeṅ guru, hetuniṅ maluya viśeṣa, tan saṅkeṅ guru hetuniṅ svatah ri panamayanira riṅ viśeṣapada, kālaniṅ samaya dharma inucap, saṅ guru mvaṅ saṅ śiṣya, samaya *pādhikārani saṅ yogīśvara, kāku guru, kāku śiṣya,

tasmāt katmu tan pinet ikaṅ varah, tan sakeṅ guru, svatah, ka, svatah, ṅa, hilaṅniṅ varah [fol3r] tan *inupekṣi, katmu rasaniṅ tan vinarah, ya sinaṅguh samyak viśeṣa, paḍa lāvan saṅ guru, ka, guru mati hetuniṅ śiṣya, mari manambah ri sira,
kunaṅ pinǝkǝt saṅ putus, tan karaṅroṅa riṅ tri uparǝṅga, śrī, bhakti, bhojana, hetuniṅ maṅkana, kapaṅgihaniṅ samaya, sāśadharmma, mayājñāna śūnyata, ndā maṅkana pratama saṅ putus,
kunaṅ sira saṅ maliṅgih riṅ padma sira tumarima śrī, bhakti, bhojana, āpan sinambah iṅ rāt, pinakaguruniṅ jagat, umarah riṅ nīti yogya, pan hana ṅaranira, bhaṭāra akāryadharma sira,

kunaṅ saṅ putus bhaṭāra icchāniṣkāryadharma sira, maṅkana taṅ reh, ka, *pet prih kahilaṅaniṅ śarīra, nda hayva ta tan inaku, tan inaku, ṅa [fol3v], kadyāṅgani saṅ mamaṅan tḍa riṅ pahǝhan, sumurupi loṅan, tan inaku ṅaraniṅ śarīra yan maṅkana, inaku, ṅa, tan ilaṅniṅ cāramaryāda, mvaṅ meṅöt sakinavruhanya, inaku ṅaraniṅ śarīra yan maṅkana, hayva ta maṅkana,

prih kahilaṅanya, makadvāra vruh riṅ saṅkan paran, prih kalpasanta sakiṅ bhuvana, nda hayva ta *iṅatīta lǝyǝp, makadvāra vruh yan anāgata tan vipatha, prih kahilaṅaniṅ bāyu, hayva ta hinnǝb, makadvāra kanirupekṣan, prih kahilaṅaniṅ śabda, hayva ta humnǝṅ, makadvāra kasarvajñān, prih kahilaṅaniṅ hiḍǝp, hayva ta tan *patǝlǝṅ, makadvāra vruhnira riṅ maṅavruhi, prih kahilaṅaniṅ tutur, hayva ta lupa, makadvāra vruh riṅ manon [fol4r], prih kahilaṅaniṅ manon, hayva ta vuta, makadvāra vruh katmu tan pinet, ndan sira viśeṣa, prih kahilaṅaniṅ viśeṣa, hayva ta tan viśeṣa, makadvāra tan umaku tan pamastu,

nahan pratama saṅ putus, nda ya tikā pada bhaṭāra, riṅ sakala pratyakṣa, ri kotsāhaniṅ jāgrapada, ahöm mvaṅ turyapada ikā, cǝt pveṅ jñāna luput saṅkeṅ māyātattva, ya turyāntapāda, ṅa, ri samaṅkana taṅ sinaṅguh vidon, ṅa, ri denya tan hananiṅ don, lāvan sinaṅgah maturū tan paṅipi, ndatan kǝneṅ prǝman, makahetu paḍǝmniṅ *jñānendriya, miṅsǝp riṅ antahṛdaya,

hayva ta pratipakṣa riṅ pakṣa maṅkana, hayva ta tuṣṭi, āpan prajñāpāramitekaṅ [fol4v] sarvajñā, mvaṅ sarvakāryakarta, ya tika hetuniṅ maṅatīta, mataṅyan līna humnǝṅ vruh tan apuṅguṅ, valuyakna pamutus ṅūni, mari maśarīra deniṅ vruh riṅ saṅkan paran, ṅa, ikaṅ taya, vyaktinyan saṅkan, maṅandǝli kāma ratih, ikaṅ jñāna sakiṅ taya ikā, kunǝṅ vyaktinyan paran, ri kālaniṅ pati ndi paranya, mareṅ śūnya jugekā, ka, dadi sakeṅ taya, maluya mariṅ taya, maṅkana svabhāvaniṅ janma,

kunaṅ saṅ putus, tan maluya sira riṅ saṅkan paran, nimittaniṅ mari maśarīra, mari *kabhuvanan, deniṅ anāgata tan vipatha, anāgata, ṅa, hana tan tumut, vipatha, ṅa, tan karakǝt riṅ bāyu deniṅ kasarvajñān, kasarvajñān, ṅa, kavyāpakaniṅ [fol5r] katon, karǝṅə̄, kahucap, kahiḍǝp, mari hiḍǝp deniṅ matǝlǝṅ, tǝlǝṅ, ṅa, *jumro kǝtikaṅ kinotsāhakǝn riṅ antasūkṣma, mari tutur deniṅ vruh yen manon pratyakṣa, mari manon deniṅ vruh yan katmu tan pinet, yan maṅkana ikaṅ inaṅgǝhakǝn viśeṣa, ade, mari viśeṣa, deniṅ tan pamastu, ndah ya tika kuñci rahasya, ṅa,

ndan ri paramapaścat saṅ hyaṅ pramāṇa tan intara saṅke tǝlǝṅniṅ hṛdaya, patiṅgalniṅ rekha gavaygavaynira ri sakalaniṣkala, lvirnya, katon, karǝṅə̄, kahucap, kahiḍǝp, ya ta humisǝp riṅ gave, pagavenira, ṅa, ikaṅ hiḍǝp mvaṅ tutur, ya ta mapisan riṅ pramāṇa, ka, pramāṇa [fol5v] mary *amramāṇakǝn, ya sinaṅgah viśeṣa mari viśeṣa, ṅa, tan iṅgutniṅ viśeṣa mokṣa ṅke, mapuhara siddha niṣkala, rǝp svayaṃ sira, umnǝṅ *umiṅǝti, tan kabhuvanan, tan śinarīran, tan *inajñānan, ya ta kaliṅaniṅ siddha, mokṣa lǝpas, siddha, ṅa, siniṅsiniṅ rūpavarṇa, mokṣa, ṅa, tan hana kapaṅguhanya, lpas, ṅa, luput iṅ jñāna, mvaṅ śarīra, hayva ta rinakva, hayva *minne, hayva tinǝmbe, hayvenuśana*, uśana, ṅa, riṅ kunakuna, hayva minaṅkana, hayva minaṅke, apa pva juga, aṅhiṅ byakta tuhu jugeka, kumva kunǝṅ liṅanta saṅ sevaka dharma,

apa pva tan trus tumon bhaṭāra, riṅ cǝmpa, riṅ malayu, mvaṅ sarvadeśa, yan tuhu byapaka [jump-fol6v1], ika ṅke tan inucap, ya ta kuñci rahasya, ṅa, atīta bhaṭāra riṅ bhuvana, pagǝhakna ri tǝlǝṅniṅ antasvātma, hayvenaranan, hayva tinuduh, hayvenaku, hayvenuśana, kunaṅ hetuniṅ maṅatīta bhaṭāra riṅ bhuvana, mary asaṅśaya, sakinabhaktyaniṅ rāt, kunaṅ yan tumut abhakti, rva teka keḍǝpanya, *kumvatakǝn bhaṭāra riṅ bhuvana, umorakǝn bhaṭāra riṅ śarīra, bhrānta saṅ putus yan maṅkanaha, tumutakǝn ambǝkiṅ rāt, āpan tuṅgal ya bhaṭāra riṅ śarīra, yan iṅ bhuvana, hanenak ta *pagiligiligan bhaṭāra riṅ śarīra, yan hana saṅśayanǝn, mvaṅ vikalpanǝn, tan molah hana humnǝṅ juga pinakasandhisandhi, ṅa, maniddhākǝn, nihan upadyanta, pa[jump-fol6r1]rananta havananta mariṅ sabraṅ, kunaṅ yan ramon, kaniṣṭha ikā, yan banava kunaṅ, madhyama ikā, kunaṅ ikaṅ uttama, vivāhana juga, vivāhana, ṅa, maṅkenucap maṅke tka, maṅke tka, ṅa, iki, iki, ṅa, bhaṭāra ya sinama ya, sama, ṅa, paḍa, paḍa, ṅa, ya, ya, ṅa, ftan dudu, vyaktinyan paḍa, tuṅgal huripniṅ sarāt, vyaktinyan ya, viśeṣa ikaṅ iki de saṅ umaṅgihakǝn, ka, mary ātakon umary aṅucap, mary avarah, mari vinarah, mary amet mari pinet, āpan bhaṭāra ṅucap, bhaṭāra inucap, bhaṭāra mavarah, bhaṭāra vinarah, bhaṭāra met, bhaṭāra pinet, ya kaliṅaniṅ laṅgǝṅ tuṅgǝṅ, umnǝṅ tan molah, vruh yan samayaviśeṣa, ikā bhāṣa samaya, y[jump-fol8r1]eka upadeśa, ṅa, humnǝṅ tan anarana jugeka, makapucakniṅ viśeṣāntyapāda, abhyāsa yoga taṅhi tan byāpāra juge nityaśa, katǝmvaniṅ samādhi, vehǝn taṅ samādhi luputa sakeṅ śarīra, samādhi luput saṅke śarīra, ṅa, tan inavikanikadon, vidon, ka, yeka śabdāsat, ka, yāvat maṅkana sarisari, ya pavak bhaṭāra, ndan sira ta śrī jagatnātha, ṅa, śrī, ṅa, mahalǝpa, jagat ṅaranya, bhuvana, mvaṅ sarvajanma, nātha, ṅa, prabhu, ndan sira ta vvitniṅ sarvatattva, sira mijilakǝn bhuvana, mvaṅ sarvajanma saprakāra || i ||

ka, saṅke māsakāla ikaṅ śarīra, [jump-fol7v1], taha si, āpan katavǝṅan deniṅ sakala, pradhānaśarīra bhaṭāra, mataṅyan tan vnaṅ maṅkana, kunǝṅ riṅ antaśarīra, siddha viśeṣa mokṣāvak, tan hana māna vṅisira, ka, mati rumuhun tinivakǝn tan pagagadha, ikaṅ tumakitaki iki, paḍa niṣkala pati, mvaṅ niṣkala maṅke, ya ta byakta tuhutuhu, ṅa, hayva kady aṅrǝṅö gǝröh, deniṅ maṅrǝṅö ri kojaran bhaṭāra, ka, gumuruhguruh tan vruh ri vkasnya, hayva kady aṅambuṅ mnur kinaṇḍut deniṅ lyan, deniṅ maṅrasani rasa bhaṭāra, maṅambuṅ tan vruh ri uṅgvanya, kunaṅ saṅ putus, vruh uṅgvaniṅ tan pahuṅgvan, vruh ri vkasniṅ tan pavkas, uṅgvaniṅ tan pahuṅgvan, kunaṅ vyaktinya, bhaṭāra yan tan tu[jump-fol7r1]mut śarīra, yan avūk drava ikaṅ śarīra, tan milu bhaṭāra avūk, haneṅ prakṛti juga sira, prakṛti, ṅa, ikaṅ taya, kunaṅ hetuniṅ kasaputan ptǝṅ riṅ mati, āpanya tan alah ikaṅ saṅśaya, vikalpa, tṛṣṇa, lupa, ri kālaniṅ hurip, hetuniṅ maṅdadi muvah, saṅke prakṛti ikā, maṅandǝli śukla śoṇita, *kelvilu bhaṭāra deniṅ hiḍǝp, mvaṅ tutur, āpan ya maṅhanakǝn caturvikalpa, nimittaniṅ tan kasa[fol7r3]putan ptǝṅ riṅ antaśarīra, mataṅyan svayaṃ bhaṭāra manu riṅ rāt, tan milu bhuvana, tan kasaputan ptǝṅ, tan kapaḍaṅan āditya, āpan gavenira riṅ vikalpa ikā, ka, maṅke iki vkasniṅ viśeṣāntyapāda [jump-fol8v1] sakeṅ śarīra ikaṅ aji mvaṅ guṇa, sakeṅ guṇa aji ikaṅ deva, sakeṅ deva tuduh ikaṅ i sor i ruhur, kulvan, vetan, lvar, kidul, ri madhya,

div.ab: iti saṅ hyaṅ pamutus, kayatnakna de saṅ sevaka dharma, hayva cavuh bvat upadrava ||
